00012   TcmtEventIdentifier::TcmtEventIdentifier(const unsigned int maxLayer, const unsigned int startBackLayer, const std::string &forcedEncoding) {
00013 
00014     reset();
00015 
00016     _maxLayer = maxLayer;
00017     _forcedEncoding = forcedEncoding;
00018     _startBackLayer = startBackLayer;
00019     _xPos.setBinning(20,-500.,500,0);
00020     _yPos.setBinning(20,-500.,500,0);
00021     _xPosBack.setBinning(20,-500.,500,0);
00022     _yPosBack.setBinning(20,-500.,500,0);
00023 
00024     setMuonThresholds(1,4, 0.75,5.5, 11,32, 15.,53., 6, 2,6, 9 );
00025   }

00027   void TcmtEventIdentifier::setMuonThresholds( const int   layerMuonHitMinCut,
00028                                                const int   layerMuonHitMaxCut,
00029                                                const float layerMuonEnergyMinCut,
00030                                                const float layerMuonEnergyMaxCut,
00031                                                const int   sumMuonHitMinCut,
00032                                                const int   sumMuonHitMaxCut,
00033                                                const float sumMuonEnergyMinCut,
00034                                                const float sumMuonEnergyMaxCut,
00035                                                const int   towerMuonHitCut,
00036                                                const int   numberTowersMuonMinCut,
00037                                                const int   numberTowersMuonMaxCut,
00038                                                const int   numberLayersMuonCut) {
00039 
00040     _layerMuonHitMinCut     = layerMuonHitMinCut     ;
00041     _layerMuonHitMaxCut     = layerMuonHitMaxCut     ;
00042     _layerMuonEnergyMinCut  = layerMuonEnergyMinCut  ;
00043     _layerMuonEnergyMaxCut  = layerMuonEnergyMaxCut  ;
00044     _sumMuonHitMinCut       = sumMuonHitMinCut       ;
00045     _sumMuonHitMaxCut       = sumMuonHitMaxCut       ;
00046     _sumMuonEnergyMinCut    = sumMuonEnergyMinCut    ;
00047     _sumMuonEnergyMaxCut    = sumMuonEnergyMaxCut    ;
00048     _towerMuonHitCut        = towerMuonHitCut        ;
00049     _numberTowersMuonMinCut = numberTowersMuonMinCut ;
00050     _numberTowersMuonMaxCut = numberTowersMuonMaxCut ;
00051     _numberLayersMuonCut    = numberLayersMuonCut    ;
00052   }
00053 
00054   void TcmtEventIdentifier::reset() {
00055 
00056     _nHits      = 0;
00057     _nHitsBack  = 0;
00058     _energy     = 0.;
00059     _energyBack = 0.;
00060 
00061     _backEnergyRatio = 0;
00062 
00063     _nMuonLikeLayers = 0;
00064     _nMuonLikeTowers = 0;
00065 
00066     _layerHits.clear();
00067     _layerEnergy.clear();
00068     _layerEnergy.resize(_maxLayer+1,0);
00069     _layerHits.resize(_maxLayer+1,0);
00070 
00071     _energyS.clear();
00072     _energyS.resize(4,0);
00073     _rmsE = 0;
00074 
00075     _xPos.clear();
00076     _yPos.clear();
00077     _xPosBack.clear();
00078     _yPosBack.clear();
00079 
00080   }
00081 
00082   void TcmtEventIdentifier::process( lcio::LCCollection *col ) {
00083 
00084     std::string encodingString = col->getParameters().getStringVal("CellIDEncoding");
00085 
00086     if (_forcedEncoding != "") encodingString = _forcedEncoding;
00087     else if (encodingString == "") encodingString = "M:3,S-1:3,I:9,J:9,K-1:6";
00088                                                     
00089     FastDecoder* Kcoder = FastDecoder::generateDecoder(encodingString,"K");
00090 
00091     reset();
00092 
00093     for (int i =0; i < col->getNumberOfElements(); ++i ) {
00094 
00095       lcio::CalorimeterHit *hit = dynamic_cast<lcio::CalorimeterHit*>( col->getElementAt(i) );
00096 
00097       if (hit) {
00098 
00099         int   cellID = hit->getCellID0();
00100         float energy = hit->getEnergy();
00101 
00102         unsigned int K = Kcoder->decodeU(cellID);
00103 
00104         if (K == 0 || K > _maxLayer)
00105           {
00106             std::cout<<"\n TcmtEventIdentifier: K="<<K<<" maxLayer: "<<_maxLayer<<std::endl;
00107             throw BadDataException("TcmtEventIdentifier::process() K outside range");
00108           }
00109 
00110         bool vertical  = K%2;
00111 
00112         const float *position = hit->getPosition();
00113 
00114         if (vertical) _xPos[position[0]]++;
00115         else _yPos[position[1]]++;
00116 
00117         _energy         += energy;
00118         ++_nHits;
00119         _layerEnergy[K] += energy;
00120         ++(_layerHits[K]);
00121 
00122         _energyS[(K-1)/4] += energy;
00123 
00124         if (K >= _startBackLayer) {
00125 
00126           if (vertical) _xPosBack[position[0]]++;
00127           else _yPosBack[position[1]]++;
00128 
00129           _energyBack += energy;
00130           ++_nHitsBack;
00131         }
00132 
00133       }
00134     }
00135 
00136     _backEnergyRatio = _energyBack/_energy;
00137 
00138     for (unsigned int i =1; i < _layerEnergy.size(); ++i) {
00139       _rmsE += pow(_layerEnergy[i]-(_energy/(float)(_layerEnergy.size() -1 )),2);
00140     }
00141     _rmsE = sqrt(_rmsE);
00142 
00143     for (unsigned int layer=1; layer < _maxLayer; ++layer)
00144       if (   _layerEnergy[layer] >= _layerMuonEnergyMinCut && _layerEnergy[layer] <= _layerMuonEnergyMaxCut
00145              && _layerHits[layer]   >= _layerMuonHitMinCut    && _layerHits[layer] <= _layerMuonHitMaxCut )
00146         ++_nMuonLikeLayers;
00147 
00148     std::vector<int> xTowers = _xPos.getVector();
00149     std::vector<int> yTowers = _yPos.getVector();
00150 
00151     for (unsigned int tower = 0; tower < xTowers.size()-1; ++tower)
00152       if ( (xTowers[tower] + xTowers[tower+1]) >= _towerMuonHitCut )
00153         ++_nMuonLikeTowers;
00154 
00155     for (unsigned int tower = 0; tower < yTowers.size()-1; ++tower)
00156       if ( (yTowers[tower] + yTowers[tower+1]) >= _towerMuonHitCut )
00157         ++_nMuonLikeTowers;
00158 
00159 
00160     _bits.clear();
00161 
00162     if (_energy >= _sumMuonEnergyMinCut) _bits.setMinSumEnergyMuon(true);
00163     if (_energy <= _sumMuonEnergyMaxCut) _bits.setMaxSumEnergyMuon(true);
00164 
00165     if (_nHits >= _sumMuonHitMinCut) _bits.setMinNumberHitsMuon(true);
00166     if (_nHits <= _sumMuonHitMaxCut) _bits.setMaxNumberHitsMuon(true);
00167 
00168     if (_nMuonLikeLayers >= _numberLayersMuonCut) _bits.setMinNumberMuonLikeLayers(true);
00169 
00170     if (_nMuonLikeTowers <= _numberTowersMuonMaxCut)  _bits.setMaxNumberMuonLikeTowers(true);
00171     if (_nMuonLikeTowers >= _numberTowersMuonMinCut)  _bits.setMinNumberMuonLikeTowers(true);
00172 
00173     delete Kcoder;
00174   }
00175 
00176   void TcmtEventIdentifier::addResults( const std::string parNameTcmtEventBits, lcio::LCEvent *evt ) {
00177     evt->parameters().setValue(parNameTcmtEventBits,_bits.getInt());
00178   }
00179 
00180   void TcmtEventIdentifier::addResults( lcio::LCCollection *col ) {
00181 
00182     col->parameters().setValue("eventBits",_bits.getInt());
00183     IntVec bitVec =  _bits.getIntVec();
00184     col->parameters().setValues("eventBitVec",bitVec);
00185 
00186     col->parameters().setValue("nMuonLayers",_nMuonLikeLayers);
00187     col->parameters().setValue("nMuonTowers",_nMuonLikeTowers);
00188 
00189     col->parameters().setValue("energy",_energy);
00190     col->parameters().setValue("energyS0",_energyS[0]);
00191     col->parameters().setValue("energyS1",_energyS[1]);
00192     col->parameters().setValue("energyS2",_energyS[2]);
00193     col->parameters().setValue("energyS3",_energyS[3]);
00194     col->parameters().setValue("energyRMS",_rmsE);
00195     col->parameters().setValue("energyBack",_energyBack);
00196     col->parameters().setValue("backEnergyRatio",_backEnergyRatio);
00197     col->parameters().setValue("nHits",(int)_nHits);
00198     col->parameters().setValue("nHitsBack",(int)_nHitsBack);
00199     col->parameters().setValues("layerEnergy",_layerEnergy);
00200     col->parameters().setValues("layerHits",_layerHits);
00201 
00202 
00203     lcio::IntVec workAroundMissingConst;
00204     workAroundMissingConst = _xPos.getVector();
00205     col->parameters().setValues("xPosDistribution", workAroundMissingConst );
00206     workAroundMissingConst = _yPos.getVector();
00207     col->parameters().setValues("yPosDistribution", workAroundMissingConst );
00208     workAroundMissingConst = _xPosBack.getVector();
00209     col->parameters().setValues("xPosBackDistribution",workAroundMissingConst);
00210     workAroundMissingConst = _yPosBack.getVector();
00211     col->parameters().setValues("yPosBackDistribution",workAroundMissingConst);
00212   }
